attributes.description: At Kia Konfidence Hatfield we pride ourselves on delivering quality Pre-Owned vehicles to our clients. All our vehicles undergo a 125-quality point check, Dekra roadworthy, Dekra Condition report and a valet before being delivered . All vehicles are delivered with a full service history. The one thing we pride ourselves in more than anything is EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE. When buying a vehicle from us, you join the Kia Family and family look after each other. We will tailor make a package that will not only suit your needs and your pocket too. We deal through all major financial institutions and always pride ourselves on giving you the best deal. CALL NOW and one of our experienced Sales Executives will gladly bring the vehicle out to you for a test drive from the comfort of your own home or workplace. Nationwide delivery. All Trade-in's welcome.

attributes.title: 2020 Mercedes-Benz C-Class C 300 Auto

attributes.description: FULL 7 PAGE DEKRA CONDITION REPORT COMPLETED I bought one of these cars brand new in 2002, their are some design faults, being front wheel drive there is quite a bit of torque steer when accelerating quickly and the car has the turning circle of a rhino but none of that matters, FAR AND ABOVE THE CAR THAT I HAVE LOVED THE MOST I traded it in for a 3.2 V6 BRERA in 2007 and not a day goes by that I dont regret that decision this GTV has been Perfectly looked after and maintained by an ALFA FANATIC, FULL SERVICE HISTORY WITH ALFA SPECIALISTS INCLUDING SERVICE RECENTLY COMPLETED. These 3.0 V6 motors were the last of the true ALFA ROMEO built engines before they reverted to the generic and heartbreakingly disappointing GM general motors engines found in the 159 and BRERAs. This 3.0 V6 sings in the old raspy Barry White tone that made the brand so revered and adored. I have yearned for this sound for years and couldnt believe my luck when I stumbled upon this vehicle. It soothes me every time I have the pleasure of driving it. It is instantaneously clear that great care and love has been taken in looking after and maintaining her. Dulce Cream White, Grey leather upholstery is perfectly original and in amazing condition,u00A0It will be difficult for me to see this one go, but will consider selling it if its going to the right home, only worthy candidates will be considered Top of the range CARTRACK tracking unit pre fitted for your safety and security
attributes.title: 2000 Alfa Romeo GTV 3.0 V6

attributes.description: owner since new, THIS CAR IS ABSOLUTELY PERFECT NEW GENERATION TSI ENGINE WIDELY REGARDED AS ONE OF THE BEST ENGINES VW HAVE EVER MADE, crazy light on fuel, amazing performance Full service history, EVERY service completed on schedule with VOLKSWAGEN balance of VW factory warranty which equals 100 peace of mind motoring THIS IS THE FULL COMFORTLINE spec and comes Fully Loaded with all the extras and luxuries that you can possibly imagine including Multifunctional Steering wheel, , VW parking pilot package with self parking assist plus and REVERSE CAMERA and Park distance control, NEW GENERATION TOUCH SCREEN INFOTAINEMENT PACKAGE WITH APP DOWNLOAD FUNCTION, APPLE PLAY AND PHONE MIRROR TECHNOLOGY auto armor smash and grab safety film also included The vehicle is AS new, such a stunning vehicle Top of the range CARTRACK tracking unit pre fitted for your safety and security AA TESTED FOR INCREASED QUALITY ASSURANCE

attributes.description: EVERYTHING THAT CAN POSSIBLY GO WRONG ON THESE MERC A CLASSS HAS ALREADY BEEN DONE AND REPAIRED ON THIS ONE. R90 0000 SPENT GEARBOX REPAIRED WITH WARRANTY TIMING CHAIN REPLACED ALL THE RISK HAS BEEN MITIGATED BY THE FACT THESE ITEMS HAVE BEEN DONE keep in mind that if you are buying a similar a class then you may be required to undertake similar repairs soon The one owner since new, 20 OUT OF 10, perfectly original and immaculate in every way, Full service history, every single service completed on schedule and up to date Diamond Black Metallic, Black Leather Upholstery is like new and finished with Satin Silver AVANTAGARDE Trim, such a sexy combination. Loaded with all the Elegance extras including Climate control airconditioning, Park Distance Control Front and Rear, Multifunctional AVANTGARDE SPORTS leather steering wheel, Bluetooth connectivity package, Isofix child seat connection, Beautiful MBENZ AVANTAGARDE Alloy wheels, FULL LEATHER PACKAGE, Chrome Line Exterior, Auto Armor safety smash and grab tinted windows etc. etc. Carefully looked after by fanatical previous owner. 4 TYRES ARE IN EXCELLENT CONDITION amazing petrol engine offers brilliant power, SUPER LIGHT ON FUEL, SUCH A PLEASURE TO DRIVE IN AUTOMATIC, Must be seen to be appreciated. Top of the range CARTRACK tracking unit pre fitted for your safety and security AA TESTED FOR INCREASED QUALITY ASSURANCE
